name: Gurudev Forgings
tag_list: hex-bolts, half-thread-bolts, heavy-hex-bolts, t-bolts, l-bolts, u-bolts-and-carriage-bolts-
overview:
Established in the year 2000, we, “Gurudev Forgings & Engineering”, are a prominent firm, engaged in manufacturing and supplying wide assortment of optimum grade Metal Bolts, J Bolts, Metal Studs, Metal Rods, Forged Fasteners and Foundation Bolts. Under this range, we are offering Hex Bolts, Half Thread Bolts, Heavy Hex Bolts, T Bolts, L Bolts, U Bolts and Carriage Bolts. In this range, we offer Combo Head Bolts, Hex Flange Bolts, Round Head Bolts, Full Threaded Studs, Galvanized Studs and many more.

Our Team: Our organization is backed by a team of experienced professionals, which enables us to come up with the qualitative range of Metal Bolts, J Bolts, Metal Studs, Metal Rods, Forged Fasteners and Foundation Bolts. Hired by a strict selection process, these professionals are well-versed with the entire process of this domain. Furthermore, our team of dedicated employees enables us to meet the every minute requirements of the esteemed customers.

Our Quality: It’s the quality of our offered array of Metal Bolts, J Bolts, Metal Studs, Metal Rods, Forged Fasteners and Foundation Bolts, which distinguish us from the other industry counterparts. To offer our customers superior-grade forged products, our professionals make use of optimum quality raw material, which is obtained from the most trusted vendors of the market.

Our Infrastructure: We have constructed a safe & sound infrastructure, which equipped us to manufacture and supply a comprehensive range of Metal Bolts, J Bolts, Metal Studs, Metal Rods, Forged Fasteners and Foundation Bolts. Our facility, which spreads over large area of land is installed with the latest machinery and cutting-edge technology.

Our Products: Metal Bolts, J Bolts, Metal Studs, Metal Rods, Forged Fasteners and Foundation Bolts. Under this range, we are offering Hex Bolts, Half Thread Bolts, Heavy Hex Bolts, T Bolts, L Bolts, U Bolts and Carriage Bolts.
